title: Pics: Refurbished Le Vendome reopens
text:
Need a flight? We'll scan dozens of airlines and get you the best fare in seconds! Pics: Refurbished Le Vendome reopens Wed, 15 Jul 2015 7:40 AM Share Your Email Radisson Blu Le Vendome Hotel. Image supplied. 
The Radisson Blu Le Vendome Hotel , located on Sea Point's Platinum Mile, has reopened following a R30-million refurbishment. 
The hotel aims to present a classic, old-world feel which has a touch of modern. The upgrades seek to enrich the luxury experience of the boutique hotel. 
Guests will now be able to visit the newly refurbished property. 
Phase two of the refurbishment will see a spa and gym added to the hotel. Meanwhile, phase three will revitalise the rooms. 
Le Vendome boasts 143 luxury rooms and suites, with views of the surrounding area.
